desc:
Please extract judgment data for the following plaintiffs and based on the rules set out below:

Plaintiffs
%Investec%
%SBSA%, %Standard Bank%
%ABSA%
%FNB%, %First National Bank%, %FirstRand Bank%
%Nedbank%
%African Bank%
%BMW%

Rules
Record must be verified
The following fields may not be blank:
1.	Name 1
2.	Surname
3.	Case Type
4.	Nature of Debt
5.	Case Granted Date
6.	Case Number
7.	Court
8.	Amount (Can be 0 in some instances such as Rescissions)
9.	Plaintiff Name
10.	Attorney Name (Can be â€˜No Attorneyâ€™)
11.	Verified Date
Only one record must be extracted based on Case Number, Court Name, ID Number and Case Type and Case Reason. This is to eliminate duplicates.

Logged by Neil
name: CW - CCW381 - Data extract - Multiple Plaintiffs
